Class AnalyticsController

java.lang.Object
com.nrifintech.cms.controllers.AnalyticsController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/analytics/") public class AnalyticsController extends Object
This class handles requests to the `/analytics` endpoint

  • Method Details

    • getTotalExp

      @GetMapping("totalexp/{date1}/{date2}") public Response getTotalExp​(@PathVariable String date1, @PathVariable String date2)
      This function returns the total expense between two dates
      Parameters:
      date1 - The start date of the period you want to get the total expenses for.
      date2 - The end date of the range
      Returns:
      A response object with the total expense between the two dates.

    • getDateWiseExp

      @GetMapping("datebydateexp/{date1}/{date2}") public Response getDateWiseExp​(@PathVariable String date1, @PathVariable String date2)
      This function is used to get the expense between two dates
      Parameters:
      date1 - The start date of the range
      date2 - The end date of the range
      Returns:
      A response object is being returned.

    • getTotalSales

      @GetMapping("totalsales/{date1}/{date2}") public Response getTotalSales​(@PathVariable String date1, @PathVariable String date2)
      This function returns the total sales between two dates
      Parameters:
      date1 - The start date of the period you want to get the total sales for.
      date2 - The end date of the range
      Returns:
      A response object with the total sales and a status of OK.

    • getDateWiseSales

      @GetMapping("datebydatesales/{date1}/{date2}") public Response getDateWiseSales​(@PathVariable String date1, @PathVariable String date2)
      This function takes two dates as parameters and returns the sales between those two dates
      Parameters:
      date1 - The start date of the range
      date2 - The end date of the range
      Returns:
      A response object is being returned.

    • getBestSeller

      @GetMapping("bestseller/{date1}/{date2}") public Response getBestSeller​(@PathVariable String date1, @PathVariable String date2)
      This function returns the best seller of the given date range
      Parameters:
      date1 - The start date of the period you want to check
      date2 - The end date of the period you want to get the best seller for.
      Returns:
      A list of the best selling products

    • getOrderStats

      @GetMapping("orderstats/statusstats/{date1}/{date2}") public Response getOrderStats​(@PathVariable String date1, @PathVariable String date2)
      This function returns a list of order status statistics for a given date range
      Parameters:
      date1 - The start date of the report
      date2 - The end date of the range of dates you want to get the report for.
      Returns:
      A list of order status stats

    • getOrderMealtypeStats

      @GetMapping("orderstats/mealtypestats/{date1}/{date2}") public Response getOrderMealtypeStats​(@PathVariable String date1, @PathVariable String date2)
      This function returns a list of meal types and the number of orders for each meal type between two dates
      Parameters:
      date1 - The start date of the report
      date2 - The end date of the report
      Returns:
      A list of OrderMealTypeStats
